import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; const Navbar: React.FC = () => { const { user, logout, isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; return (
Blog App
{isAuthenticated ? (
Create Post
{isMenuOpen && (
Profile
)}
) : (
Sign in Sign up
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
